::KitKat::

She transformed into wolf mode and pulled the blanket over her with 
her teeth.  She really wanted to stay out in the wilderness for a 
while longer, but she had to return.  She opened her commlink to 
Quickstrikes specific frequency. "We found Rowdy and all three of us 
are headed back to the base Commander Quickstike. Sir we shall return 
shortly. KitKat out." Normally she would go through the formalities 
like that.  But she felt it would be good to make Quickstrike look 
good in front of an old friend.  She looked at Terrorsaur, and then 
to Rowdy.  She liked another wolf being around.  She hoped he would 
be around for a while.  She still missed having a pack.  And being 
int he company of another wolf again felt good.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@h...> 
wrote:
> Rowdy Wolf:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> "No, this is it." he said to KitKat. He turned his head, to where 
Zyber was. 
> "I'm going to help my friend. You are welcomed to follow. But your 
decision 
> is your own destiny." He turned his head back to KitKat and 
Terrorsaur. He 
> put his rifle behind his armor and fur, then transformed to his 
beast mode. 
> "Then we shall go?" he said to them. "Lead the way."
> 
> Terrorsaur lifted himself into the air and transformed to beast 
mode. He 
> lowered down and grabbed the bundle of furs in his claws. He even 
managed to 
> put a fur blanket over his back and wings.
>
